responses.rationale: The segment discusses expert advocacy for vaccine development but contains no explicit calming language or assurance of current safety/control.
The segment describes the potential of mRNA technology but lacks explicit calming language or assurance of current safety/control.
The segment reports on the history of Moderna's research but contains no explicit calming language or assurance of current safety/control.
The segment reports on plans for a trial and a capability ('could respond very quickly') but lacks explicit calming language or a direct link to present public safety from an official source.
The segment reports that trial results will be watched and previous data was mixed, lacking explicit calming language.
The segment reports a statement about being mindful of an issue and lack of contracts, not an explicit calming cue.
The segment reports a statement about not committing prematurely, not an explicit calming cue.
The segment reports negative facts (deaths, positive tests) but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment reports some positive facts (improvement) but also concerns ('worried'), lacking explicit calming language.
The segment reports a positive fact (not detected elsewhere) but lacks explicit calming language from the source or author.
The segment reports facts about condor reproduction and impact of loss, lacking explicit calming language.
The segment reports a negative impact ('tremendous impact') and duration ('decades'), lacking explicit calming language.
The segment reports a number (low population) but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment reports expert opinion on spread mechanism, lacking explicit calming language.
The segment reports historical pattern vs. current situation, lacking explicit calming language.
The segment reports uncertainty and ongoing studies, lacking explicit calming language.
